item.title: ISO 2023.11.19 out now
item.description: This new installer provides a fix for the new SymmOS update 1.0.2 causing the system to not install properly. You can download the file or torrent from the downloads page.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: SymmOS 1.0.2.0 released
item.description: This new version of Symmetrical OS brings a custom bashrc script. You will need to create a new user or copy the files for the changes to apply.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: SymmOS 1.0.1.0 released
item.description: This new version of Symmetrical OS brings a small utility to install some basic apps after installation.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS 1.0.0
item.description: The first ISO and SymmOS version is now out! Go ahead and download it!
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: VM testing is done
item.description:
Virtual machine testing has been complete! We will shortly be moving on to testing on real hardware.

We will be testing Symmetrical OS on older hardware to ensure compatibility and also write the system requirements.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Installation completed successfully
item.description:
I am glad to announce that the installer is working! There are still some issues that need to be resolved, such as the cursor not showing on the first two pages of the installer.

The ISO should be released in early to mid November. Stay tuned!
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Oh no, I forgot my password!
item.description: The installer is almost done. In fact so close that it would be possible to release it now! However, you can't log in to the new system. We have tried all sorts of methods of setting the user's password but no matter what we do, it will not work.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Sid, I'm Disappointed In You (not really)
item.description: You know, you could have asked me and I would have helped you with the dependencies.hey you, the inspect element guys. don't tell anybody. i'm hiding here in the code
item.author: LeWolfYT

item.title: Dependency hell
item.description: Oh python. The project leader, LeWolfYT, wrote the installer in python. One of the problems with python is dependencies. I mostly write in haxe which bundles the dependencies inside the program. Python does not. This means I have to figure out which dependencies are already included with python and add them to the ISO package list.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: First ISO is almost working
item.description: The new new installer written in python is complete! We have begun VM testing and will soon begin hardware testing. Once all of that is done, it will be released to the public as the first ISO of Symmetrical OS.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS Installer Development Update #5 - So close
item.description: Symmetrical OS will be available soon... if I have enough motivation.
item.author: LeWolfYT

item.title: We are making a file manager!
item.description: We have just started development on a new file manager. Eventually this will replace Thunar included with XFCE4.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: First release delay
item.description: We originally planned for the first ISO to be available on October 1st. It will probably not be available until late October or early November.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: New news writer
item.description: For a long time we have been manually writing the XML document to add new items to the news feed. We finally have a dedicated tool for writing new news articles!
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: News viewer will now show times in local time zone.
item.description: The news viewer on the website's home page will now show the time of the post in your local time zone. Previously it would display in UTC.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS Development Update
item.description: Our update utility is complete! We are in the process of testing the app. Once that is all done it will be ready to ship in the first version of Symmetrical OS.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS Installer Development Update #4 - TK
item.description: I have a love-hate relationship with Tkinter. On one hand, it's simple and works well, but on the other hand, it's also been a giant pain.
item.author: LeWolfYT

item.title: Core repository is finished!
item.description: Escam's core repository now has all of the packages from the Arch Linux core repository. You will not be able to use these packages for a while because it's gonna take a bit of time to add everything the the database file.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Escam is almost ready!
item.description: Our package manager, escam, is almost ready for release! In terms of features, everything is complete. There are just a couple bugs we need to work out. We will not be using escam as the main package manager in SymmOS until the entire Arch Linux core and extra repositories are converted to escam-compatible repositories.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS Installer Development Update #3 - Whoops!
item.description: We've been having some issues with the installer, but we're making progress! Mainly, we're rewriting it in Python. Stay cool!
item.author: LeWolfYT

item.title: Symmetrical OS Installer Development Update #2
item.description: The installer ISO is almost done! There are some issues here and there that need to be fixed before the release.
item.author: SidGames5

item.title: Symmetrical OS Installer Development Update #1
item.description: Development has begun on the installer! The first ISO should be downloadable very soon.
item.author: SidGames5
